data.title: Help Kevin read these messages (ROT13.5)
data.statement:
[EN]
Kevin has received an encrypted message from his girlfriend, he wants you to decipher it.
He would have heard that the encryption to use would be ROT13.5.

[FR]
Kevin a reçu des messages cryptés de sa copine, il souhaite que tu lui décrypte. Il aurait entendu que le cryptage utilisé serait le ROT13.5.

[ROT13.5]
The principle of ROT13.5 simple encryption which shifts each letter by 13 and the digits of 5 of course when we reach z the next one becomes a.

testCases.title: Address
testCases.testIn: Zl nqqerff vf 673 pu qr yn ebpnqr 51034 - Cnevf Prqrf
testCases.testOut: My address is 128 ch de la rocade 06589 - Paris Cedes

testCases.title: Address 2
testCases.testIn: 82 Purzva qr yn gheov 51555 - Avpr Prqrk 0
testCases.testOut: 37 Chemin de la turbi 06000 - Nice Cedex 5

data.constraints:
0< length of [[str]] <150
The encrypted character of [[str]] [A-Z][a-z][0-9] 

[EN]
[[str]] The numbers have a rotation less than the letter.

[FR]
[[str]] Les chiffres ont une rotation inférieure à celle des lettres.
data.stubGenerator:
read str:string(150)
write Your message for Kevin
data.inputDescription:
[EN]
You receive the message [[str]] encrypt.

[FR]
Vous recevez le message [[str]] crypter.
data.outputDescription:
[EN]
You have to decrypt it.

[FR]
Vous devez le décrypter.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

[EN]
Kevin has received an encrypted message from his girlfriend, he wants you to decipher it.
He would have heard that the encryption to use would be ROT13.5.

[FR]
Kevin a reçu des messages cryptés de sa copine, il souhaite que tu lui décrypte. Il aurait entendu que le cryptage utilisé serait le ROT13.5.

[ROT13.5]
The principle of ROT13.5 simple encryption which shifts each letter by 13 and the digits of 5 of course when we reach z the next one becomes a.
Input
[EN]
You receive the message str encrypt.

[FR]
Vous recevez le message str crypter.
Output
[EN]
You have to decrypt it.

[FR]
Vous devez le décrypter.
Constraints
0< length of str <150
The encrypted character of str [A-Z][a-z][0-9]

[EN]
str The numbers have a rotation less than the letter.

[FR]
str Les chiffres ont une rotation inférieure à celle des lettres.
Example
Input
V ybir lbh
Output
I love you
